input: Which one of the following was not the basis invoked by the US for attacking Iraq in March 2003?

options.A: Iraq possessed weapons of mass destruction
options.B: Saddam Hussain had links with A1 Quaeda
options.D: Iraq had not withdrawn from Kuwait complety

explanation: The question of withdrawal of Iraq from kuwait was an issue in 1991 Iraq war. This was not an issue during 2003 Iraq war.
